                                java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Compiles a shader into an object
        Parameters:
        g - GL3
        shaderType - GL3 shader type
        shaderCode - The code to compile as a size 1 string array
        Returns:
        identifier for the shader object
        Throws:
        ShaderException
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
